tool_description: Tracks dispute resolution timelines, deadlines, and milestone progress for chargeback cases.

case_type.description: Type of case: chargeback, retrieval_request, pre_arbitration, or arbitration

initial_date.description: Case initiation date in ISO 8601 format

card_network.description: Card network with specific timeline rules: visa, mastercard, amex, or discover

error_messages: Invalid case type: Use one of [chargeback, retrieval_request, pre_arbitration, arbitration]. Check case_type parameter spelling and ensure it matches the actual case.
Invalid date format: initial_date and response_deadline must be valid ISO 8601 date-time strings. Verify date formatting and ensure logical chronological order.
Deadline in past: The response_deadline has already passed. Timeline tracking requires future deadlines for effective case management.
Unsupported card network: Use one of [visa, mastercard, amex, discover]. Different networks have varying timeline requirements and milestone definitions.
usage: Provide case_id, case_type, initial_date, response_deadline, and card_network to track dispute timelines. The tool monitors progress and provides deadline alerts.

days_remaining.description: Number of days until response deadline

timeline_status.description: Current timeline status: on_track, at_risk, or overdue

next_milestone.description: Description of the next required action or milestone

urgency_level.description: Case urgency based on timeline: low, medium, high, or critical
